vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Mizpah = "watchtower"
This name is used for:
1) a place in Gilead north of Jabbok and location of Laban's cairn
2) a place in Gilead south of Jabbok; site unknown
3) a place near Mount Hermon
4) an old sacred place in Benjamin
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   lugar; Galaad; (b)   ciudad; territorio de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米斯巴 这个陰性專有名詞 地名在希伯來文的意思是 "瞭望台"
1) 在基列, 雅博北方, 拉班的石標處
2) 可能在雅博南方; 地點不詳
3) 近黑門山之處
4) 便雅憫之舊聖地
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
米斯巴 这个阴性专有名词 地名在希伯来文的意思是 "瞭望台"
1) 在基列, 雅博北方, 拉班的石标处
2) 可能在雅博南方; 地点不详
3) 近黑门山之处
4) 便雅悯之旧圣地

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another spelling of ra.mot gi.l.ad (רָמֹת "Ramoth" H7433)
§ Mizpah = "watchtower"
This name is used for:
1) a place in Gilead north of Jabbok and location of Laban's cairn
2) a place in Gilead south of Jabbok; site unknown
3) a place near Mount Hermon
4) an old sacred place in Benjamin
